EventSupportInfo
struct
EventSupportInfo
Types
Query

What type of information to retrieve

TRIGGERS

0x01 - Query the supported trigger types and max count for each

ACTIONS

0x02 - Query the supported action types and max count for each

Variables
query
Query query

Type of information

maxInstances
uint8 maxInstances

Maximum number of supported triggers/actions

entries
EventTypes entries

Event info
